text: what do you think about first when you
go for a job interview the moment you
are invited for an interview you think
about what you're going to wear well yes
that's the first question that appears
in my mind so sometimes when we are very
excited for the interview
we might just overdo all right we might
just where excessive stuff at other
times we might go a bit too formal as if
we are going to a wedding on other times
there's a possibility that we don't care
so we might go very very casual other
than list there are many more fashion
mistakes that we tend to make you might
be very smart at dressing but sometimes
we all tend to slip up for job
interviews so keep watching this session
with me Michelle on skillopedia the
place where you learn skills for the
real world because today I'm going to
share with you five of the worst fashion
mistakes that you must avoid
[Music]
